item.description:
Becca to Coordinate

Mobil Station on Rt 138 at Exit 8 off of Rt. 495 in Raynham (Taunton) at 8:00 am leaving at 8:30 am. 

2nd pick up at Shopping Center - just past where BK used to be (Rt 140/Rt 122) in Grafton at 10:00am leave at 10:30am.   We will stop for lunch and re-fueling, then off to the cemetary to arrive around 2:00pm.   We usually wrap up the day around 3-4 pm to head home. You are welcome to join any/all part of the ride. Unfortuantely, Oscar and Hennie (Gilda's parents) will not be back in Massachusetts until sometime in July and Becca can not arrange her schedule for a later date. Rest assured, Thalia and Brian will meet up with us at the cemetary.
item.name: Gilda's Ride
